org.apache.lucene.queryparser.flexible.standard.config
Class NumericConfig

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.lucene.queryparser.flexible.standard.config.NumericConfig

public class NumericConfig
extends Object

This class holds the configuration used to parse numeric queries and create NumericRangeQuerys.

See Also:
NumericRangeQuery, NumberFormat
